mapper.insert:
insert into work_task_record

work_task_record.end_time,
work_task_record.exit_code, work_task_record.page_downloaded,
work_task_record.start_time,

values

mapper.update:
update work_task_record
work_task_record.download_sucess = #{downloadSucess},
work_task_record.end_time = #{endTime},
work_task_record.exit_code = #{exitCode},
work_task_record.page_downloaded = #{pageDownloaded},
work_task_record.start_time = #{startTime},
work_task_record.success = #{success},
work_task_record.task_id = #{taskId},
work_task_record.task_main_config_id = #{taskMainConfigId},
work_task_record.worker_id = #{workerId}
work_task_record.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select work_task_record.download_sucess, work_task_record.end_time, work_task_record.exit_code, work_task_record.id, work_task_record.page_downloaded, work_task_record.start_time, work_task_record.success, work_task_record.task_id, work_task_record.task_main_config_id, work_task_record.worker_id form work_task_record
